# Mermaid Mermaid is a javascript library for creating diagrams. Leo Vue can create (and then display) Mermaid markup to summarize the contents of a subtree. Since Leo subtrees can contain cloned nodes, the resulting diagrams can be can be more complex than a simple outline. Mermaid directives: * **@mermaidtd:** create a top down diagram * **@mermaidlr:** create a left right diagram * **@mermaidrl:** create a right left diagram Clicking on the icon in the upper right of the content pane displays the Mermaid markup, which you can use in other environments that support Mermaid. Options (in YAML format) can be placed in the directive node, e.g: ``` height: 400 click: goto // click will go to node, otherwise displays popup rounded: // or 'circle' or 'square' fa: user // any font awesome icon name fill: "#85FD31,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px;width:100px" ```
